SELECT CONCAT(WEEK(MIN(completed_at), 1) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(MIN(completed_at), INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(MIN(completed_at)) - 1 DAY), 1) + 1, '주차') AS week, -- 10월 내의 주차 계산 COUNT(*) AS count FROM Quiz_Sets_Results WHERE YEAR(completed_at) = #{year} -- 연도를 필터링 AND MONTH(completed_at) = #{month} -- 월을 필터링 GROUP BY WEEK(completed_at, 1) -- 주 단위로 그룹화 ORDER BY WEEK(completed_at, 1) -- 주 순서대로 정렬

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(completed_at, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM Quiz_Sets_Results WHERE YEAR(completed_at) = #{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(completed_at, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(completed_at, '%Y-%m')

SELECT CONCAT(WEEK(MIN(completed_at), 1) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(MIN(completed_at), INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(MIN(completed_at)) - 1 DAY), 1) + 1, '주차') AS week, -- 10월 내의 주차 계산 COUNT(*) AS count FROM Learning_Progress WHERE YEAR(completed_at) = #{year} -- 연도 필터 AND MONTH(completed_at) = #{month} -- 월 필터 AND status = 'completed' GROUP BY WEEK(completed_at, 1) -- 주 단위로 그룹화 ORDER BY WEEK(completed_at, 1) -- 주 순서대로 정렬

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(completed_at, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM Learning_Progress WHERE YEAR(completed_at) = #{year} -- 연도 필터 AND status = 'completed' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(completed_at, '%Y-%m') -- 월별 그룹화 ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(completed_at, '%Y-%m') -- 월 순서대로 정렬

SELECT pr.activity_name AS activityName, SUM(p.points_change) AS points FROM Points p JOIN Point_Rules pr ON p.source = pr.rule_id WHERE p.points_change > 0 GROUP BY pr.activity_name ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT SUM(p.points_change) FROM Points p WHERE p.points_change > 0
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS quizParticipationCount FROM Quiz_Sets_Results WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, AVG(total_score) AS averageQuizScore FROM Quiz_Sets_Results WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS learningMaterialCompletionCount FROM Learning_Progress WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'completed' GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, CONCAT(ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100, 2), '%') AS completionRate FROM Learning_Progress WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id
